name: learning-collaborative-maps
description: Interactive map to help coordinate healthy relationship education in the Chicago area.

scripts.build:vendorjs: mkdir -p public/js && browserify --require leaflet --require react --require react-dom --require xhr-promise --debug -p [minifyify --map vendor.min.js.map --output public/js/vendor.min.js.map] > public/js/vendor.min.js
scripts.build:app: mkdir -p public/js && browserify --external leaflet --external react --external react-dom --external xhr-promise --debug -p [minifyify --map learningcollaborative.min.js.map --output public/js/learningcollaborative.min.js.map] -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 react ] ] --standalone LearningCollaborative js/src/learningcollaborative.js > public/js/learningcollaborative.min.js
scripts.build:vendorstyles: mkdir -p public/css && cp -r node_modules/leaflet/dist/images public/css && cat node_modules/leaflet/dist/leaflet.css >> public/css/vendor.css
scripts.build: npm run build:vendorjs && npm run build:app && npm run build:vendorstyles && npm run build:styles
scripts.watch:app: watchify --external d3 --external leaflet --external react --external react-dom --external xhr-promise --debug -p [minifyify --map learningcollaborative.min.js.map --output public/js/learningcollaborative.min.js.map] -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 react ] ] --standalone LearningCollaborative --outfile public/js/learningcollaborative.min.js public/js/src/learningcollaborative.js

author: Geoff Hing <geoffhing@gmail.com>
